creator: rick.ebert@ipac.caltech.edu
text:
Apache 2.0.45 seg faults on start-up when SSL is enabled and configured.
Using shared libs: OpenSSL v 0.9.7a  and 0.9.6i  with and without openssl
mar-17-2003 and mar-19-2003 patches.  The same 2.0.45 binary starts clean
when ssl config is eliminated.  (Solaris 8, SunBlade100 & Netra).
mod_ssl componenet is a guess.

Duplicate of bug 18730

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18730 ***
creator: apache-bugzilla@hansmi.ch
